channel.title: Making a pc play hdmi from xbox 360?
channel.description:
Hello,
I currently have a laptop that has a htmi socket, I have connected it to my hdmi tv, and it works, so is it possible to connect to my pc through the htmi socket? is there a program needed to do it.
Thanks

item.title: Making a pc play hdmi from xbox 360?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Yess 360’s do have an HDMI ports, D T 55.

Get an HDMI -> DVI adapter, you’ll need to find a way to get the sound from it though.

Read full topic

item.source: Making a pc play hdmi from xbox 360?

item.title: Making a pc play hdmi from xbox 360?
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

[quote=“I james I, post:1, topic:254326”]Hello,

I currently have a laptop that has a htmi socket, I have connected it to my hdmi tv, and it works, so is it possible to connect to my pc through the htmi socket? is there a program needed to do it.

Thanks[/quote]

HDMI only supports Video and Surround Sound Data Transfers…

Make yourself clear are you trying to connect your Pc to your laptop or your Xbox to your PC?

I really dont understand what you are talking about?

You can connect your PC and Laptop Together using a Special Ethernet Cable and Your Xbox360 can only be connected to a TV Via HDMI…

Are you sure your PC has a Video card that has a HDMi Socket; They are pretty expensive!

Read full topic
